channel.title: Ryan Griego's blog
channel.description: I went from being a graphic design major to a software engineer. Welcome to my blog!

item.title: Building an Automated Job Application Follow-Up System With Python and the Raspberry Pi
item.description: How I developed an automated system using Python and a Raspberry Pi to send personalized follow-up emails to hiring contacts, improving the job application process while enhancing my skill in automation.
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)

item.title: How Docker Helped Me Enhance My Web App Deployments
item.description: Docker improved my web app deployments by ensuring consistent environments with containerization, and streamlining multi-app management through Docker Compose, all while remaining portable across cloud providers.
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)

item.title: Building "Patient Appointment Booking": Streamlining Healthcare with Modern Web Technologies
item.description: A patient appointment booking app built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)

item.title: Job Getter: Get Your Job Search Into Gear
item.description: An overview of Job Getter, an application designed to automate and enhance the job hunting process.
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)

item.title: Demystifying Generative AI
item.description: In this post, I talk about some things I learned from two courses on Coursera: "Generative AI for Everyone" and "ChatGPT Prompt Engineering for Developers".
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)

item.title: 3 Things I Learned From Building a ChatGPT Clone
item.description: In this post, I talk about some things I learned building a ChatGPT clone.
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)

item.title: Who's Writing This Blog?
item.description: This post is mostly about my career in tech. I go over my journey in tech from the college years and on.
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)

item.title: New features in v1
item.description: An overview of the new features released in v1 - code block copy, multiple authors, frontmatter layout and more
item.author: ryangriego@gmail.com (Ryan Griego)
